name: Icy Bird
description:
CHRISMAS NEEDS YOU!!!! On Christmas Eve Father Grinch stole all the Christmas presents.

Your mission is to collect all the Christmas presents.
Play as Icy Bird And save Christmas!
Thanks to your long beak, you will be able to collect the Christmas presents.
You are the only one able to accomplish this mission.
Be careful, the gifts are between spikes.
We are counting on you, Icy Bird!
P.S: **THE GAME WILL BE AVAILABLE BEFORE CHRISMAS!!!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chronosiii.Icy_Bird
